Text: I don't know Vodek..I downloaded your divx version and its seems to have lost a bit of the quality from my version. Either way, its great to have a dvd quality version of a rare movie like this that probably will never get an official release. I like the alternate name poster you have up here.

Mantronixlives,
The main goal of decoding was to make possible view on hardware DVD players.
The mpeg version i uploaded would play fine in all dvd players at a higher quality.....
Not on everyone! For example my DVD (Panasonic SC-PT850) can't play it...
By the way. It will be great to make a subtitles. Lots of non english spoken people like this movie. Subtitles will be big support to understanding.
